param.description: Use the <param> tag to describe a method's parameters.

remark.description: The <remarks> tag supplements the information about types or members that the <summary> tag provides.

returns.description: The <returns> tag describes the return value of a method declaration.

see.description: The <see> tag lets you create a clickable link to a documentation page for another code element.

summary.description: The <summary> tag adds brief information about a type or member.

value.description: The <value> tag is similar to the <returns> tag, except that you use it for properties.
